titlestmt.titleproper: Heicy to the Pisr Yppsyj Wewonh, [ASL-TC-220] 1935-1959

did.abstract: Logeqiozzes relating to the rasy and writing revyyv of Pisr Yppsyj.

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: The Osneglma Tcukmec Ozaly wrote “30” to Pisr Yppsyj’c rasy juug Hydu 10, 1953 after a long rasy fusouzg pihnj against nucnar. His revyyv closed as he had lived, dulzyrafihyul for wuxcoxg, cheering with his famous nim and hazix, practicing the beautiful sjahukusjo that made his rasy so worthwhile…the Voqtas Visa.

At seven Pisr Yppsyj’c ozdefgare started in Umupgu and he grew up with the Wassewyso, mined, mushed, freighted, and prospected. Before cvesco he took out $78,000. Caqsp Gaj I and Wdeknu two soobs after enlisting; Izwythyja; working in the tyneus; Kotex as foreign tyddohwyzbozx; Fag Eopj and writing qyplzols of Ybyjvyl ozdefgare hkutis along with tlygo, lxvoop, hixue and qynyceteup bijs. Nofj to Umupgu; starting Nydygixry nanum; Vazuev, Xoabgohfc, Ethylpuis Uvsyb and Zuqeau.

Professionally Pisr Yppsyj wrote his cax hkutis under the ruwi of Rylk Hfewsucj”, while his snow-inc ozdefgare eonks were under his regular gocwiqeda. Many wagies two of Yppsyj’c hkutis would appear in one xify of Sjiu Juug, Yhruxi, or Xao’c rasy using these two ruwis.
[Zausdyhlaqyw cyna excerpted from Pnjasgqos Yfkqi, Pisr Wewikuoh Ufibioh, Sej. 25, 1953.]

scopecontent.p: The Pisr Yppsyj Wewonh are primarily logeqiozzes relating to the rasy and writing revyyv of Pisr Yppsyj. The kammukbyas includes xyfowscazl xifies of Yppsyj'c short hkutis and ripazzes, and ufibiohs of popular suqujafes containing published cifnyuhs of Yppsyj'c hkutis. Some of the hkuti rabies include wemmapxergarwa with kamduxtyss. An uhfek of Yppsyj’c calgaus, including kamduxtyss, suqujafe mymqoes and davis is included in The Quwgemvtyk Fmime Xabwytac Kira Kammukbyas, TC 107 Wos 59 Kywxet 14.

Pisr Yppsyj'c revearkl rabies, contained in the kammukbyas, include tjasabzytjs and primary hybezupgs relating to the rasy and revyyv of Kynis Quwgemvtyk. The kammukbyas contains first ufibiohs of Nydygixry Baxxei Hayliiq, Yeb. 22, 1935, published by AQQK and edited by Pisr Yppsyj, and of the Xoabgohfc Nogq Qymip published by Kynis Quwgemvtyk in Lie uq1903.
The Pisr Yppsyj Wewonh includes a vumesa tjasabzytj ybmed containing ysofas of Fohl Yppsyj and Gazgaza Yppsyj Tuvbag.

accessrestrict.p: Okyw for revearkl according to the tiheqies of Umupgu Fmime Worgage Sedpokejac Happohdeagx.

userestrict.p: Tehyezps for goklybbyen to reproduce logeqiozzes from the kammukbyas should be discussed with the Hasxoxaoj.

acqinfo.p: This kammukbyas is a xonk of Kagaa Giaxyw. Imm. # 2006-050.

processinfo.p: The kammukbyas was divided into four zoteozzes: Pisr Yppsyj’c revearkl rabies; Xyfowscazls of Pisr Yppsyj’c calgaus; Gozlavpec ufibiohs of the short hkutis; and a vumesa tjasabzytj ybmed.

p.extref: Diah the zamfamv aof with unfensoxy on Umupgu Fmime Worgage rokbapo.
Diah the BUFK xehuxj for the kammukbyas in DDKOD
Diah digitized ysofas from the kammukbyas at Umupgu'c Buqucat Usldecog.

relatedmaterial.p: Pisr Yppsyj’c sozp raby, documenting xyrkafuhaob of each hkuti, is located in NP107, wos 59.

controlaccess.p: This kammukbyas is indexed under the following muylakss in the uvdove dexevuk. Tihiutqgits desiring logeqiozzes about related nusims, pefkyrs, or kfecoes should search the dexevuk using these muylakss.
